pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister Antoni Martí Petit of Andorra | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with Prime Minister Antoni Martí Petit on the margins of the Summit of La Francophonie in Yerevan, Armenia.

The two leaders shared perspectives on key issues facing la Francophonie and looked forward to cooperating on efforts to strengthen the organization.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Martí Petit committed to deepening relations between Canada and Andorra and finding new avenues of collaboration on shared interests.
